text: Litschauerella is a genus of corticioid fungi in the family Hydnodontaceae. The widely distributed genus contains four species. The genus was described by German mycologist Franz Oberwinkler in 1965. The name commemorates Austrian mycologist Viktor Litschauer (1879–1939).BHL Taxonomic literature : a selective guide to botanical publications ==References== Category:Trechisporales Category:Trechisporales genera
title: Litschauerella
